cscie55.hw4.bank.InsufficientFundsException

  • Packages that use InsufficientFundsException 
    Package Description
    cscie55.hw4.bank  

    • Uses of InsufficientFundsException in cscie55.hw4.bank

      Methods in cscie55.hw4.bank that throw InsufficientFundsException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void BankImpl.transferLockingAccounts(int fromId, int toId, long amount)
      METHOD: TRANSFERLOCKINGACCOUNTS -synchronizes the fromAccount and toAccount to execute transaction for withdraw and deposit method calls -provides concurrency
      void Bank.transferLockingAccounts(int fromId, int toId, long amount) 
      void BankImpl.transferLockingBank(int fromId, int toId, long amount)
      METHOD: TRANSFERLOCKINGBANK -synchronizes entire bank object for withdraw and deposit method calls -does not provide concurrency
      void Bank.transferLockingBank(int fromId, int toId, long amount) 
      void BankImpl.transferWithoutLocking(int fromId, int toId, long amount)
      METHOD: TRANSFERWITHOUTLOCKING -does not synchronize for withdraw and deposit method calls -uses separate threads instead
      void Bank.transferWithoutLocking(int fromId, int toId, long amount) 
      void AccountImpl.withdraw(long amount)
      METHOD: WITHDRAW -handles exceptions for withdraw amounts less than or equal to 0 -handles exceptions for insufficient funds when the withdraw amount is greater than the balance -subtract amount from balance for valid parameter
      void Account.withdraw(long amount)
